name: clipping
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C usually plural ] a piece that has been cut off something: grass/nail clippings
[ C ] an article cut from a newspaper: A friend sent me a newspaper clipping about someone we were at school with.
Oleksandr Hruts/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
